description: Support to the National Committee for Demining & Rehabiliation in Jordan

subproject.corporate outcome: National and local institutions have the capacities to reduce the impact of disasters, especially climate change related disasters, on vulnerable communities
subproject.description: The project is designed to develop the capacities of the National Committee for Demining & Rehabilitation (NCDR) and Royal Engineering Corps (REC) to undertake mine clearance based on UN international mine action standards (IMAS). Specifically, the capacity development components of the project aimed to contribute to the technical and managerial capacity of the two organizations so that clearance would be conducted in a safer and more efficient manner in the future.
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: Mine Action
